title: When YOU LOSE Your BRAKES!!! In the RAIN | American Truck Simulator #shorts #ats #simulator

tasks.task: Operating a loader to move dirt
subtasks: Starting the loader engine
Moving to the location of the dirt pile
Lowering the bucket to scoop the dirt
Driving the loader to the designated area
Elevating the bucket to release the dirt

tasks.task: Driving a forklift to transport hay
subtasks: Inspecting the forklift for safety
Moving to the hay storage area
Positioning the forks under the hay stack
Lifting the hay onto the forklift
Transporting the hay to the barn

tasks.task: Using a milking machine on a cow
subtasks: Attaching the milking machine to the cow
Activating the milking process
Collecting the milk into a container
Disinfecting the areas after milking
Walking through the field to determine planting spots
Gathering the seeds
Using a planting tool to make furrows
Inserting the seeds into the furrows
Covering the seeds with soil
Identifying equipment that needs cleaning
Removing dirt and debris from the equipment
applying cleaning solutions if necessary
Rinsing the equipment thoroughly
